Creative CommonsAll Pictures and Stories!

bitcoin is pretty bloody complex. All of a sudden you’re expected to know about; game theory, economics, technology and cryptography just to figure out what’s going on.

The good news is there’s a truck load of content for you to consume as you fall deeper and deeper into this new wonderland. The bad news is that a “truck load” is a lot of content and it gets confusing.

So this site is all about taking these concepts and trying to explain them thorugh a series of pictures and short stories, with a touch of humour if we can manage it.

BIPS. Bitcoin In Pictures and Stories.

If you don’t believe me or don’t get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry
check out bips.rocks, it’s awesome.

Satoshi Nakamoto, 2010 (paraprhased)
